name: A Bird Carol
description:
This is my first game ever! Created in 5 days for the Totally Ranked Holiday Jam.

All assets created by me, except for cutscenes and main menu art which my gf drew.

The ending is silly but I ran out of time :p

Controls:

 Move left and right with A and D

Jump with Space and plane in the air by keeping Space pressed

Estimated playthrough length: 3 minutes
